stadium.name: The Buccaneer's Bowl
stadium.description: A flashy, pristine stadium built on a private beach exclusively for resort guests. The field is imported turf, and a massive, puppet kraken in the bay entertains the crowd at halftime.

stats.pregame_ritual: Slapping their own helmet until their ears ring.
Sticking leeches to their legs to 'lighten their step'.
Bribing a local oracle with a meat pie for a vague prophecy.
Reviewing hand signals for secret plays.
Reading their own fortune in a scattering of knuckle bones.
Thanking their armor for the protection it's about to offer.
Painting their teeth with a mixture of charcoal and water.
Doing a series of loud, guttural breathing exercises.
Reciting their grocery list backward to clear their mind.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Chugging a raw egg, shell and all.

stadium.name: The South Pole Palisade
stadium.description: A crude, fortified playing field built from rough-hewn logs. It's less a stadium and more a stockade against the wilderness. The 'grass' is mostly frozen mud and straw.

stats.pregame_ritual: Smelling their own game-worn socks from the previous match.
Braiding their hair into tight, battle-ready rows.
Listening to the wind for a sign of which way the game will turn.
Getting a teammate to punch them in the shoulder, hard.
Wearing a specific, garishly colored pair of undergarments.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Polishing their boots with bacon grease.
Clapping their hands a prime number of times.
Reciting a short, epic poem about a past victory.
Turning their helmet around three times before putting it on.
Licking a whetstone.

preGame:
# üçπ TUESDAY NIGHT TROLLBALL: BATTLE OF THE BOTTLE! üçπ

**GOOD EVENING, BLOOD FANS!** This is **Nok the Corrupter**, broadcasting LIVE from the sun-drenched, sand-blasted, soon-to-be-blood-soaked **Buccaneer's Bowl** on Toast Island! Strap yourselves in and pour yourselves a stiff one, because tonight's game between the **South Pole Yetis** and the **Tortell Privateers** has been declared an **OPEN BAR MATCH**! That's right, folks! The beer taps are flowing freer than the arteries of a goblin in a blender!

It‚Äôs a **Cedar Hill showdown** tonight! You'd think being faction-mates under the watchful eyes of **Imra** and **Elspeth Ortell** would make these teams friendly? **HA!** Not on my watch! The **Tortell Privateers** are looking pristine on their imported turf, but don't let the resort setting fool you. I saw **Lilithe Royce** in the locker room sticking **leeches** to her legs to 'lighten her step.' Disgusting! I love it! And **Dib Tufts**? He just chugged a raw egg, shell and all! If that doesn't curdle with the ale, I don't know what will!

On the other side, dragging the freezing mud of the south into this tropical paradise, we have the **South Pole Yetis**! These folks are grim, gritty, and ready to rumble. Their healer, **Seiter Aida**, was seen huffing a pair of game-worn socks from last week! If that stench doesn't revive a corpse, nothing will! And keep an eye on **Sale Tocci**, braiding her hair so tight it's pulling her eyebrows back! They look ready to kill, or maybe they're just thirsty! The kegs are tapped, the weapons are sharpened, and the liver failure is imminent! **LET'S PLAY TROLLBALL!**
postGame:
# üç∫ THE HANGOVER REPORT: YETIS FREEZE OUT THE PRIVATEERS! üç∫

**WHAT A NIGHT! WHAT A FIGHT! WHAT A DISGRACE TO SOBRIETY!** 

Folks, I haven't seen this much stumbling since **High Venture Brennen Farno** tried to explain inflation to the poor! The final score is in, and the **South Pole Yetis** have stumbled their way to victory over the **Tortell Privateers**, **4 to 2**! The sun was hot, the drinks were cold, and the blood was lukewarm! Let's crack open the recap of this intoxicating display of violence!

The game started with the coordination of a three-legged dog race. We saw block after block as the alcohol hadn't quite hit the bloodstream yet. Both teams were testing the waters, or should I say, the liquor! The silence was broken when the Yetis' **Hilaire Guevara** decided that **Lilithe Royce** needed a nap, delivering a bone-crunching tackle that sent the Privateer off on a stretcher! But don't worry, **Eugen Zacks** slapped a helmet on her head and sent her back in‚Äîmedicinal brandy works wonders, folks!

The Privateers struck first blood on the scoreboard, though! **Loralee Sunny**, looking surprisingly steady on her feet, weaved through the defense and **DUNKED** that troll head right into the End Zone! **1-0 Privateers!** The crowd went wild, and by wild, I mean they started chugging Imra's special reserve like it was water! The intoxicating mist of victory‚Äîand spirits‚Äîdescended upon the field.

Then came **HALFTIME**, or as I like to call it, "Happy Hour!" Both teams retreated to their benches, not for rest, but to heed the call of the Open Bar. When they came back out, oh boy, the physics engine of reality took a vacation. Players were swaying like trees in a hurricane! 

The second half belonged to the Yetis, and specifically to their shooters! But first, **Lilithe Royce**, clearly fueled by a vengeance cocktail, went on a rampage! She tipsily tackled **Selima Si** into oblivion, and moments later, flattened **Sayers Erdda**! She was a drunken wrecking ball, proving that aiming juice really does improve your aggression!

However, you can't tackle a ball that's flying over your head! **Duky Orelee**, clapping a prime number of times‚Äîwhich I assume is harder when you're seeing double‚Äîlaunched a beauty from Center Field! **BOOM!** Two points for the Yetis! The score flipped to **2-1**, and the South Pole bench erupted in a chorus of slurred cheering and belching!

The violence didn't stop there. **Kidder Starkey** of the Privateers decided to join the party, smashing **Jessy Debbie** into the turf. But the Yetis kept their eyes on the prize, or at least one of their four eyes did. **Isborne Krause**, miraculously staying upright despite the open bar, launched another rocket from Home Field! **ANOTHER TWO POINTER!** The Yetis extended their lead to **4-1**!

The Privateers tried to rally late in the game. **Melisande Eustacia**, stumbling around like **King Nezmear** after a werewolf breeding mishap, managed to crash into the End Zone for a pity dunk. It brought the score to **4-2**, but it was too little, too late‚Äîand definitely too drunk.

The clock ticked down, bodies were strewn across the pristine resort grass like garnish in a bloody mary, and the **South Pole Yetis** claimed victory! A massive win for the visitors, who proved that they can hold their liquor just as well as they hold a grudge. 

As for the **Tortell Privateers**, maybe **Elspeth Ortell** needs to spike the punch a little less next time, or perhaps **Imra** needs to invent a potion that prevents double vision! Until next week, this is **Nok the Corrupter**, signing off and reminding you: **IF YOU CAN'T BEAT 'EM, EAT 'EM!** (Or at least drink them under the table!)
